preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 16 g of B (Boron) using an accurate scale. 
 2. Weigh 9 g of Er (Erbium). 
 3. Weigh 4 g of Si (Silicon). 
 4. Weigh 1 g of Tc (Technetium). 
 5. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mechanical mixer or mortar and pestle to blend thoroughly until a uniform mixture is achieved.
